column3: It's a pity you can't go and see Clare. I think {{c1::she'd be|she would be}} (she / be) really pleased to see you.
In an ideal world, {{c1::everybody would have}} (everybody / have) enough to eat.
Shall I apply for the job or not? What {{c1::would you do}} (you / do) in my position?
Why don't you do the exam? I'm sure {{c1::you'd pass|you would pass}} (you / pass).
We got stuck in the traffic last night. {{c1::It would have been|It would've been}} (It / be) quicker to walk.
Why don't you want to go and see the film? I think {{c1::you'd enjoy|you would enjoy}} (you / enjoy) it.
It's a pity you couldn't come to the party. It was great and {{c1::you would have enjoyed|you'd have enjoyed|you would've enjoyed}} (you / enjoy) it.
I was in a hurry when I saw you. Otherwise {{c1::I would have stopped|I'd have stopped|I would've stopped}} (I / stop) to talk.
